name: Hentai MatchUp
description:
Hentai MatchUp is a concentration game, and what you need to do is to match all blocks.

Gameplay Guide


Victory Condition: Match all blocks.
How to Play: Click on two blocks, and they will disappear if they have the same value.

Function Keys


Keyboard P: One key finish
Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (the background image turns white and you can continue to play)
Keyboard N: Next level

Game Features


Pleasing Pictures
Soothing Music
